attributes.action: Scrap the BBC licence once and for all
attributes.additional_details: Because as we are all moving forward to new technologies  the BBC is now too ancient and is not needed
attributes.background: Stop the BBC charging a licence fee as the majority of viewers young and old do not use this service

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701068
